# nextMediaItem

**Instance Property**

The next media item in the playlist after the currently selected item.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute MediaItem nextMediaItem;
```

## Discussion

This property returns `null` if the current item is the last item in the playlist.

## Inspecting Media Items

- **currentMediaItem**: The currently selected media item in the playlist.
- **currentMediaItemDate**: Contains the current time of the media item as a `Date` object.
- **currentMediaItemDuration**: The length, in seconds, of the current media item.
- **previousMediaItem**: The item in the playlist previous to the currently selected item.
